name: SpeedWay Rampage
description:
"Speedway Rampage" is a thrilling top-down car infinite runner game that will put your driving skills to the test. In this game, you will take control of a sports car and race down an endless highway, With intuitive controls and fast-paced gameplay, you'll have to be quick and nimble to avoid crashes and keep your car on the road. As you progress you'll encounter various obstacles such as rocks and broken down cars. Are you ready to rev up your engines and take on the ultimate driving challenge?

Made by Thomas, Alex and Phoenix
